problem_summary_simple: Keep M nodes, delete N nodes, and repeat this pattern through the linked list.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through the linked list, maintaining pointers to keep M nodes and skip N nodes, modifying next pointers.
key_insights: A dummy node simplifies handling edge cases, especially when the head might be modified.
Careful pointer manipulation is needed to correctly link the kept nodes after deletion.
The loop must handle cases where the list ends before completing a full M-N cycle.
